price: Sεdeε ͻbɛfiri N’adom mu atua wͻn a wͻagye adie na wͻdi dwuma pa no ka. Nokorε sε Nyankopͻn mpε boniayεfoͻ no asεm.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti min faḍlihi innahu lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
